message: Hello Bob, I have a great product for you that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I can offer you a compromise at $160.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $160 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product.
I'm still not willing to go as low as $140, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $155.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $155 is still a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $130 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $130. I can offer you the product for $145.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'd like to try to get a better price. I'd be willing to pay $135 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $145, and I'm starting to think that we're getting close to a fair price. I can offer you the product for $142.50.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to pay $142.50. I'd be willing to pay $135 for the product, and that's my final offer.
